milestones.title: Selected as Open Source Contributor for GirlScript Summer of Code '23
milestones.description: GirlScript Summer of Code is a 3-month #OpenSource program by GirlScript Foundation.

milestones.title: Graduated from Cavite State University
milestones.description: Completed my Bachelor of Science in Information Technology degree from Cavite State University.

milestones.title: Joined EddieHub Community
milestones.description: Became a member of the EddieHubCommunity, a welcoming and inclusive community that encourages collaboration and contributions to open source projects.

milestones.title: Made First Open Source Contribution
milestones.description: Made my first open source contribution to a project on GitHub.

milestones.title: Started as Software Engineer at 100Devs
milestones.description: Started working as a software engineer at 100Devs, an agency that provides training and support to software engineers.

milestones.title: Finished Internship at iCargo Pacific
milestones.description: Successfully completed my internship as a backend development intern at iCargo Pacific, where I coded with Laravel, Postgre, Vue, and Firebase.

milestones.title: Started Internship at iCargo Pacific
milestones.description: Started working as a backend development intern at iCargo Pacific, where I worked on various projects related to web development and database management.

milestones.title: Finished Undergraduate Thesis
milestones.description: Successfully defended our Bachelor of Science in Information Technology (BSIT) thesis, which involved the development of a native Android application using Java.

milestones.title: Beginning of My College Life
milestones.description: Started my journey in pursuing a Bachelor of Science in Information Technology degree at Cavite State University.

milestones.title: Graduated from La Vlaize Integrated Science School
milestones.description: Completed my Senior High School studies with an ICT strand at LVISS.

milestones.title: Programmer Role for Senior High School Research
milestones.description: Developed a desktop application using Visual Basic and SQL as part of our senior high school research project. Also undertook freelance programming projects to enhance my skills.
